excerpt.rendered:
Macallan does some of the best single casks out there. Here we have a pair of The Macallan Exceptional Single Cask #08 from 2017 series. Matured in a single european sherry hogshead ( Cask # 11648 ), it is a 13 year old with only 304 bottles outturn.

ESC 2017/ESB-11648/08
Cask Type: European Oak Sherry Hogshead
Distilled: 18 October 2004
Bottled: 20 December 2017
One of 304 bottles

Cask number #11648

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age : 13
Vintage : 2004
ABV : 64.40%
